class.name: UtilityAISTRoot
class.brief_description: The root node for a State Tree.
class.description: This is the root node for a State Tree. To update the tree, you call the [method tick] method of its root node. This will tick all the child nodes.

method.name: get_active_states
method.description: Returns a list of currently active states.

method.name: tick
method.description: The [method tick] method is used to update the State Tree state. You can provide any Godot variant type as a parameter (usually a node used as an actor or a dictionary used as a blackboard), along with a delta-time. [code]blackboard[/code] and [code]delta[/code] are passed to the [method UtilityAIStateTreeNodes.on_enter_state], [method UtilityAIStateTreeNodes.on_exit_state], [method UtilityAIStateTreeNodes.on_tick] and [method UtilityAIStateTreeNodes.on_enter_condition] methods of the child nodes.

members.member: The time to complete a tick in usec.
